attributes.action: stop the proposed closure of the King's Lynn Arts Centre and the Princess Theatre in Hunstanton
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Both these venues are vital for local community arts groups,King's Lynn Operatic and Dramatic Society, The College of West Anglia, and the Lavender Hill Mob, as well as providing the best of U.K and international culture to West Norfolk.  Our nearest professional theatres are approximately 30 - 50 miles away in Peterborough and Norwich, to which there are no rail links. Both venues offer significant opportunities annually to young people in West Norfolk,e.g our only youth theatre, and provides Arthouse cinema and visual arts exhibition opportunities.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to stop the proposed closure of the King's Lynn Arts Centre and the Princess Theatre in Hunstanton.

Her Majesty's Government has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.hmg.gov.uk/epetition-responses/petition-view.aspx?epref=Norfolk-Arts-Cut


Her Majesty's Government
